scenario_name: Return to The City of Archives
full_name: Scenario VI: Return to The City of Archives

steps.text: Put the four Halls of Pnakotus locations into play (the 3 from the original set and the new Halls of Pnakotus (Southern Corridors)). Set each remaining location aside, out of play.

bullets.text: When instructed to put locations into play during act 1b, put Cyclopean Vaults and Alien Conservatory into play as well.

steps.text: Remove Act 2a—"Restricted Access" from the game and replace it with the new Act 2a—"Unrestricted Access."
